Body: I have Ellipsis 7 (Verizon tablet), and I can't connect to Optimum WiFi (free WiFi service provided by Optimum, Cablevision). I used to be able to connect. I got the message Authentication problem.I not only having trouble connecting to Optimum WiFi but also other WiFi connection. (Getting the same message "authenticating problem").
Title: "Authentication problem" error when trying to connect to WiFi

history.Text: I cant connect to Optimum wifi (used to be able to). I got the message "authentication problem". And also, can I connect to Optimum wifi on my windows 10 desktop?
